Pixelbar 10 Years !!!

22 Sep 2025

In 2025, Pixelbar officially celebrates its 10th anniversary!
What started as a small group of enthusiasts with a shared passion for technology, creativity, and collaboration has grown into a vibrant hackerspace in Rotterdam over the past decade.

To mark this special milestone, weâ€™re hosting a barbecue and party on September 27, 2025 at our space.
The evening will feature a community BBQ, music, a short speech by the board, and of course the chance to reconnect with members and friends of Pixelbar.

This anniversary is not only a moment to look back on ten years of projects, workshops, and community, but also to set the stage for the future.
Pixelbar will continue to be the place where makers, hackers, and creatives come together to bring ideas to life.

Merchandise

Have you heard about our merchandise?
The first batch of merchandise will be available during our 10-year anniversary!
Want to get your hands on some? Orders are closed. Stay tuned for maybe a next batch

For more information and to place your order, visit the Merchandise page.
